rewrite this in the formal academic tone of someone who is not a native speaker.
he plots in this report have also been produced using the artifacts used in the original work. That is why the reproduced figures and the original ones are the same. For brevity of the report aside from figure 1 and 2 which show the recreated and the original figures, other figures will only include the recreated charts

The diagrams contained within this report have been generated using the same artifacts utilized in the primary research. Consequently, the figures reproduced in this work are identical to the original ones. In the interest of conciseness, this report will only showcase the recreated charts, with the exception of figures 1 and 2, which display both the reproduced and original diagrams.

rewrite this:
Fig \ref{fig:perf\_breakdown} include the breakdown of speedups over the baseline version. Note that the workloads that are based on low-level PM instructions show better speed up compared to the transaction based ones because they write data back more frequently and thus improve much more with the use of PMWeaver

Figure \ref{fig:perf\_breakdown} provides a comprehensive breakdown of the speedups achieved over the baseline version. Notably, the workloads that are founded on low-level persistent memory (PM) instructions exhibit superior speedups in comparison to transaction-based workloads. This can be attributed to the fact that the former workloads write data back more frequently, thus demonstrating greater improvement upon being leveraged with PMWeaver.

rewrite this:
Moreover, different PM support operations show different gains with regards to address or data prediction based on the implementation of the support operation. That is Enc+Veri system significantly benefits from the address-only prediction, whereas the Dedup system mainly benefits from data prediction

Furthermore, it is worth noting that various support operations for persistent memory (PM) exhibit varying degrees of improvement depending on whether they are based on address or data prediction, contingent upon the specific implementation of the support operation. For instance, the Enc+Veri system demonstrates substantial gains with the use of address-only prediction, whereas the Dedup system primarily derives benefits from data prediction.
